metadata.title: CVE-2021-47358 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:staging: greybus: uart: fix tty use after free User space can hold a ttyopen indefinitely and tty drivers must not release the underlyingstructures until the last user is gone. Switch to using the tty-portreference counter to manage the life time of the greybus tty state to avoiduse after free after a disconnect.
